State.id: Simplifications: find and map to applyCollectionsScala

task.summary:
1/9/18 Progress
- Rudimentary Unit orders -- Move 1 square in cardinal directions or stay put -- Execute all orders at once (orders assumed valid, no conflict resolution) - Popup menu controls and messaging - Unit flags (HP, Order)

1/12/18 Progress - Created Battle container to organize units, the map, etc. - Also handles organizing game phase and marshalling events for the phase progressing - Game phase UI - Extremely basic unit conflict resolution - Broke out units into individual subclasses (Colonist and Trooper) - Reworked storage for units into Army object - Reworked event system to scale properly (pygame limits at 8 user events)
1/15/18 Checkpoint - Created tile selection UI. Uses a range-limited flood fill to determine selectable tiles within a range. - Added Ranger unit. Base Units still incapable of ranged orders.
1/15/18 Progress - Used tile selection UI to enable moving units multiple tiles. - Enabled ranged attacks to be conducted.

1/16/18 Progress - Units die when their health is below 0. - Added restriction on invalid orders and doubling up on positions - Added basic support for animated GameObjects. Applied this to Tiles. - Map loading improvements, added support for specifying Units already on maps
1/17/18 Progress - Added and made use of palette swapping for units, ui, etc. - Added camera support, and split the UI and game area into two separate surfaces
